attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to recognise that claude choules, now aged 108 and residing in australia, royal navy during world war one serving in the flagship hms revenge in 1917, is now britains oldest surviving world war one veteran on the death of harry patch. that his name should be revered and acknowledged by the government for all to see, enabling the royal british legion to actively cherish his name during his life time.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
